turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'd like to place an order from Peet's Coffee on Westwood Boulevard in Los Angeles, California.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order a medium vanilla latte with almond milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, let me place that order for you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so i have ordered a medium vanilla latte with almond milk to be picked up at pete's on westwood blvd, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your receipt will be texted to you and your drink should be ready for pickup in 10 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?
